titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of Robert M. La Follette, Sr., on the sesquicentennial of his birth.
A resolution honoring the life of Robert M. La Follette, Sr., on the sesquicentennial of his birth.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Celebrates the sesquicentennial of the birth of Robert M. La Follette, Sr.
Recognizes his important contributions to the Progressive movement, the State of Wisconsin, and the United States of America.
